attributes.action: Change the English football team kit to include the cross of St George.
attributes.additional_details: I think it is unacceptable that the FA and the corporate world can change a nations national flag without considering the implications on our national identity.
attributes.background: I would like our government to realise it isn't illegal to be English, and recognise that we are all proud of our flag and what it represents.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
